page.title: 20A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SARAH
page.content: I awoke at 8.00 got dressed and washed I got my sister washed(eventually ,I went downstairs and watched T.V.At 9.30 I tidied my bedroom,by the time I had supposedly finished it was untidier than when I had started(my sister had been helping),At 10.30 I caught the bus to Selby,I went swimming and when got dressed again I had to rush into Selby to buy mum some bread.We caught the bus home,and had my dinner.At 1.30 I played tennis against the wall,then I went in and watched "Carry on Teacher"on video, when that had finished I watched half of "Goldfinger",I took my sister for a walk,then had my tea.At 6.00 I took Vicki, my sister, for a bath then at 9.00 I had a wash and cleaned my teeth and went to bed,and I was asleep by about 10.00pm.
